title: ［威士忌］Glenlevit Single Sherry cask release for Taiwan
content:
https://i.imgur.com/PVJWbpq.jpg
https://i.imgur.com/Cnsrkvj.jpg
Glenlivet stands the most typically characters of Speyside, which impression was rich yet rounded flavour. Since Taiwan is one of the major imported country of whiskies, Glenlivet designed a special series of bottling for Taiwan. 
Sherry flavour, one of the most acceptable cask style for every nation, included Taiwan. Accordingly, Glenlivet hand selected those outstanding sherry casks to mature whiskies, combined with their rounded and full bodied newmakes. Complexity and times lying in every single cask releasing bottles, giving such perfect experience of every single drops of liquid.
.
58.7% abv, single sherry cask release
.
Color: deep autumn amber to dark brown
Nosing: strong sherry, honey, spicy, slightly mints
Palating: intense, full bodied and definitely a sherry bomb, ripen dark fruits, melon, caramel, heather, plums
Aftertaste: long, warm, milk chocolate, mouth watering
.
At the end, 台灣難波萬！！！
湊十五個中文字，難波萬難波萬
